feedback_section.question: Was this helpful?
landing_subtitle_complete: All things <highlight>language</highlight> for users of words at VTEX
guides_card_subtitle: Explore VTEX core principles that shape language choices in content creation
user_interfaces_card_subtitle: Write consistent, user-friendly strings for VTEX interface elements to improve usability
documentation_card_subtitle: Write help articles and developer guides that communicate VTEX knowledge effectively
grammar_card_subtitle: Learn about VTEX grammatical standards that guide all types of content
formatting_card_subtitle: Use essential formatting rules for every content type
glossary_card_subtitle: Apply terms already in use on VTEX and translate them consistently
faststore_card_subtitle: Deliver blazing-fast stores that convert with an open-source toolkit for storefront experiences
brand_card_subtitle: Bring the VTEX brand to life with a collection of graphic and conceptual codes used consistently
developer_portal_card_subtitle: Implement storefronts and apps by leveraging VTEX architecture and commerce APIs
help_center_card_subtitle: Find answers and learn about new features by exploring the VTEX knowledge base
guides_page_section.title: General
guides_page_section.content.0.title: Inclusive language
guides_page_section.content.0.descriptio: Learn how to use language that reflects diversity and promotes respectful, inclusive communication across all VTEX content
guides_page_section.content.1.title: Product and feature naming
guides_page_section.content.1.descriptio: Choose clear, concise names aligned with the VTEX brand so users can easily understand what a product or feature does
guides_page_section.content.2.title: Tone of voice
guides_page_section.content.2.descriptio: Use the VTEX tone of voice to ensure consistent personality and style across all content, from UI elements to documentation
guides_page_section.content.3.title: US English standard
guides_page_section.content.3.descriptio: Learn about US spelling patterns for writing VTEX content
user_interfaces_page_section.title: General
user_interfaces_page_section.content.0.d: Apply patterns to action labels — used in components like buttons and menus — to describe the actions users need or want to do
user_interfaces_page_section.content.1.d: Apply patterns to content labels — used in components like inputs, tables, and forms — to identify data properties and values
user_interfaces_page_section.content.2.d: Follow VTEX conventions for date and time, currency, and region codes to ensure consistent data formatting across content
user_interfaces_page_section.content.3.d: Write one-sentence descriptions that explain complex information or tasks for users
user_interfaces_page_section.content.4.d: Apply patterns to messages — used in components like inputs and alerts — to communicate system state and provide feedback on user actions in up to two sentences
user_interfaces_page_section.content.5.d: Apply patterns to placeholder text — used inside input fields — to provide temporary, concise guidance that disappears when users type
user_interfaces_page_section.content.6.d: Write concise, descriptive titles that follow capitalization and formatting guidelines to keep documentation and UIs consistent
documentation_page_section_general.title: Documentation guidelines
documentation_page_section_general.conte: Explore ways to contribute to VTEX's public documentation and help improve its quality and accessibility
Learn how VTEX creates documentation and follow best practices to create clear, concise, and user-friendly content
documentation_page_section_templates.con: Use this template to inform users about new features, improvements, bug fixes, and other product and system updates
Use this template to guide users through installation, configuration, and usage
Use this template to deliver clear, specific instructions for completing tasks or achieving goals
Learn the purpose of known issue articles, how they differ from other documentation types, and see an overview of this type of article
Use this template to introduce new users to specific technologies, tools, or systems
Use this template to inform users about updates, enhancements, and bug fixes in new product versions
Use this template to provide practical solutions to common problems users may encounter while using the platform
Use this template to provide the steps for performing tasks or understanding complex concepts in detail
formatting_page_section.title: General
formatting_page_section.content.0.title: Computer interfaces
formatting_page_section.content.0.descri: Learn how to reference and format UI elements such as placeholders, buttons, and icons for VTEX documentation
formatting_page_section.content.1.title: Headings and titles
formatting_page_section.content.1.descri: Use clear headings and titles to name the article and its sections
formatting_page_section.content.2.title: Lists and tables
formatting_page_section.content.2.descri: Use lists and tables to organize structured content so users can scan and understand it quickly
formatting_page_section.content.3.title: Procedures
formatting_page_section.content.3.descri: Learn to write clear, effective instructions that turn complex tasks into intuitive experiences
grammar_page_section.title: General
grammar_page_section.content.0.title: Abbreviations
grammar_page_section.content.0.descripti: Use abbreviations appropriately to keep content concise
grammar_page_section.content.1.title: Adjectives
grammar_page_section.content.1.descripti: Use only necessary adjectives to describe products, features, or actions clearly and improve readability
grammar_page_section.content.2.title: Articles
grammar_page_section.content.2.descripti: Learn how to include articles for readability and clarity and when to omit them in compact UI elements
grammar_page_section.content.3.title: Capitalization
grammar_page_section.content.3.descripti: Apply capitalization rules to UI elements, titles, and technical documentation to ensure clarity and consistency
grammar_page_section.content.4.title: Contractions
grammar_page_section.content.4.descripti: Learn how to use contractions for a more natural and approachable voice
grammar_page_section.content.5.title: Pronouns
grammar_page_section.content.5.descripti: Learn how to use pronouns to keep content clear and inclusive, making it more conversational and user-friendly
grammar_page_section.content.6.title: Punctuation
grammar_page_section.content.6.descripti: Use punctuation consistently to clarify UI, documentation, and system messages, improving readability and preventing confusion
grammar_page_section.content.7.title: Verbs
grammar_page_section.content.7.descripti: Use clear, action-oriented verbs to guide users through tasks — for UI, documentation, and help content
